txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from the Glimmerdeep. They have found the old mine overrun with Dourhands! Those dwarves were seen digging in some of the old and unsafe tunnels!

'We must put a stop to their mining efforts and collapse those old tunnel entrances until a time when we can properly and safely survey them!'
Your mission is to collapse the old mining tunnels in Glimmerdeep.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Glimmerdeep.
Monsters in this mission will continue to join the fight until their entry-point is destroyed.
You have been tasked with collapsing the old mining tunnels that the Dourhands have been using to dig further into Glimmerdeep.
Complete Mission: Collapsing the Old Paths
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to Glimmerdeep.'

'Well done! With those tunnels collapsed, the Dourhands should stop searching for riches in Glimmerdeep. We should look to resume our mining efforts there once all the Dourhands have vacated the mines.'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
Dourhands have found the Glimmerdeep and seek to mine what they can from its depthsâ€¦.\n\nYour mission is to collapse the old mining tunnels in Glimmerdeep.
